TITLE: Panel Discussion
DEF: Participants discussing a topic from a variety of viewpoints in front of an audience
TASK: The Panel Discussions pattern supports the discourse-focused approach where a group of experts discuss a topic in front of an audience. The pattern aims to stimulate critical thinking and foster informed decision-making by providing a platform for diverse perspectives. Challenges include balanced representation, effective moderation, and audience engagement. Engage AI for fair representation, streamlining moderation, and facilitating audience interaction.
